thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: Cristina

author: Cristina
title: Cristina
text: So I'd like to start off by saying that I was a women who was stuck on a brand when it came to tampons. Until I came across Lola. After reading about how store brand tampons can be pumped with chemicals and thinking about all the times in my life that I have used these store brand tampons shook me up a little. After plenty of research I stepped out of my store brand comfort zone and decided to try Lola. Now I am hooked and want everyone to know about this brand. The product is comfortable and does what it needs to do. I love that this company and the creatures are looking out for women and our health. I am so happy that I branched out and tried Lola! I am now a believer!
